game.name: Goblin Buster: Incremental Tower Defense
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Goblin Buster는 인크리멘탈 타워 디펜스 게임입니다. 성가신 고블린을 무찌르고, 자원을 수집하며, 독특한 건물에 투자하고, 방대한 스킬 트리를 활용해 타워와 마법을 업그레이드하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Goblin Buster is an incremental tower defense game with deep upgrade mechanics. Obliterate annoying goblins, collect materials, discover powerful relics, invest in unique buildings and spend your resources to upgrade towers and magical spells with a massive skill tree!
